name: Melanie
description:
Have you seen this girl?

What happens when your life becomes a paradox? Do you regret your decisions? What's behind The Door? Those are the kind of questions Melanie makes.

This game features adult themes

Melanie is a mystery visual novel with subtle horror themes. It tells the story of the titular protagonist, as she awakes in a strange world: "The Twilight". There, she makes friends, fights the unkown and attempts to find a way to go home.

This game was made for NaNoRenO 2019. A spanish version is in the works, and it's planned to be published in a few days after the game's release.
